Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

Value.label: Time to press the panic Watch
Value.Help: The time that the panic pushbutton must be pressed before a (panic) message is sent out to the controller. 0: send directly the panic message when pressed. 1-255: send a panic message after you keep holding the button pressed for this value x 10ms.

Value.label: Min led feedback time panic
Value.Help: Minimum time that led feedback is shown after a panic message. 0: led only stays on during the send time. 1-255: led stays on during send time + this value*10ms.

Value.label: Buttons mapped
Value.Help: With this config parameter you can map the buttons to send different Z-Wave messages. 0: SOS button sends an ALARM_REPORT to nodes group 1. 1-255: SOS button sends an BASIC_SET, 0xFF to nodes group 1.
